entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
